title: Wouldn't it be awesome if your main had a global ult?
body:
Why should {{champion:22}}{{champion:119}}{{champion:81}}{{champion:41}}{{champion:222}}{{champion:30}}{{champion:421}}{{champion:98}}{{champion:16}} have all the fun with their global ults?

Imagine if YOUR main had a global ult too. Comment who your main is and what would happen if they had a global ult. I'll start.

{{champion:5}} - every enemy champion would get sent flying across the map towards the outermost walls of Summoner's Rift. They also all get stunned for .75 seconds. For example, if blue-side Xin Zhao ganked from behind the enemy midlaner, he could ult the poor schmuck straight into the blue-side fountain and leave him stunned there.
